coffee.name: Coconut Latte
coffee.description: Perfect fusion of coconut aroma and coffee, refreshing without being cloying. Coconut milk replaces dairy for a tropical flavor.

coffee.name: Rich Milk Latte
coffee.description: Thickened milk enhances creaminess with a silky texture, ideal for those who prefer rich milk coffee.

coffee.name: Caramel Macchiato
coffee.description: Caramel sauce blended with espresso, topped with velvety foam for a balanced sweet-bitter taste. A Starbucks classic.

coffee.name: Vanilla Latte
coffee.description: Vanilla syrup mellows coffee bitterness with gentle milk aroma, perfect for coffee beginners.

coffee.name: Iced Americano
coffee.description: Just espresso and water—refreshing and energizing. A budget-friendly choice from Mixue Ice City.

coffee.name: Strawberry Iced Latte
coffee.description: Strawberry jam mixed with milk coffee, featuring fruit pulp for texture and a sweet-sour coffee blend.

coffee.name: Brown Sugar Butter Ripe Pu-erh Latte
coffee.description: Pu-erh tea base infused with brown sugar butter milk cap, offering rich layers and balanced tea-coffee bitterness.

coffee.name: Salted Caramel Cheese Vienna Coffee
coffee.description: Sea salt milk cap paired with honeycomb caramel crumbs—a savory-sweet interplay with rich texture.

coffee.name: Qingyan Rose Black Tea Fresh Milk Tea
coffee.description: Rose fragrance infused with black tea latte and fresh milk, delivering a light and elegant flavor.

coffee.name: Ice Cream Coffee
coffee.description: Vanilla ice cream melting into black coffee—hot-cold contrast with sweet-bitter balance.

coffee.name: Magnolia White Tea Latte
coffee.description: White tea base with low-fat milk, featuring subtle floral notes—ideal for sugar-conscious drinkers.

coffee.name: Avocado Mango Pomelo Sago Coffee
coffee.description: Avocado puree blended with mango pomelo sago, grapefruit bits adding tanginess—low-calorie and filling.

coffee.name: Blueberry Raw Cheese Fruit Coffee
coffee.description: Blueberry, strawberry, and raw cheese yogurt mixed with espresso—thick, sweet-sour texture.

coffee.name: Grapefruit Jasmine Cold Brew
coffee.description: Cold brew coffee with grapefruit juice and jasmine tea—refreshing and summer-perfect.

coffee.name: Brown Sugar Ginger Tea Latte
coffee.description: Brown sugar and ginger juice harmonized with coffee—warming and winter-limited.

milk_tea.name: Cheese Foam Tea
milk_tea.description: Classic cheese foam paired with tea base (choose between Four Seasons Spring Tea or Golden Phoenix Tea). Velvety texture.

milk_tea.name: Cheese Strawberry Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Fresh strawberry pulp blended with milk, topped with savory cheese foam.

milk_tea.name: Bubble Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Chewy pearls with smooth milk tea—classic Taiwanese style.

milk_tea.name: Boba Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Black tea milk tea with large boba pearls for a robust taste.

milk_tea.name: Orchid Latte
milk_tea.description: Ceylon black tea + fresh milk, topped with pecan crumbs—rich tea aroma.

milk_tea.name: Mango Pomelo Sago Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Mango coconut milk base with sago and grapefruit bits—sweet yet light.

milk_tea.name: Classic Grass Jelly Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Grass jelly + red beans + pearls + peanut crumbs—generous toppings for fullness.

milk_tea.name: Rock Salt Cheese Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Savory-sweet cheese foam layered with Assam black tea—complex flavors.

milk_tea.name: Cheese Foam Green Tea
milk_tea.description: Refreshing green tea base topped with light cheese foam.

milk_tea.name: Thick Taro Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Velvety taro paste + fresh milk + black tea base—rich and filling.

fruit_tea.name: Grape Cheezo Tea
fruit_tea.description: Kyoho grape pulp + green tea base + cheese foam—intense fruitiness.

fruit_tea.name: Superior Cheese Strawberry
fruit_tea.description: Fresh strawberry pulp + jasmine tea base, topped with savory cheese foam.

fruit_tea.name: Fresh Passionfruit Double Bomb
fruit_tea.description: Passionfruit + coconut jelly + pearls—tangy and refreshing.

fruit_tea.name: Mango Pomelo Sago
fruit_tea.description: Mango + grapefruit bits + coconut milk + sago—classic Hong Kong style.

fruit_tea.name: Ultimate Cheese Grape
fruit_tea.description: Grape pulp + jasmine tea base + cheese foam—creamy texture.

fruit_tea.name: Blueberry Raw Cheese Fruit Tea
fruit_tea.description: Blueberry + strawberry + avocado blended with raw cheese yogurt—thick sweet-sour mix.

fruit_tea.name: Guava Berry Cheese
fruit_tea.description: Guava + coconut milk + strawberry pulp, topped with savory-sweet cheese.

fruit_tea.name: Strawberry Peach Cheese
fruit_tea.description: Strawberry + peach pulp + jasmine green tea base, with velvety cheese foam.

fruit_tea.name: Fresh Lemon Honeydew Ice
fruit_tea.description: Honeydew pulp + lemon juice + green tea—refreshing summer drink.

fruit_tea.name: Watermelon Boba
fruit_tea.description: Watermelon juice + crispy boba—top summer thirst-quencher.

cakes.name: Tiramisu
cakes.description: Classic Italian coffee dessert

cakes.name: Vintage Tiramisu
cakes.description: Authentic Italian recipe—coffee and mascarpone cheese fusion, dusted with cocoa powder. Rich and moist.

cakes.name: Basque Cheesecake
cakes.description: French-style dense cheesecake with caramelized top and creamy center. Moderate sweetness; pairs well with raspberry jam.

cakes.name: Durian Cheesecake
cakes.description: Durian pulp blended with cheese—rich and creamy. A must-try for durian lovers, balanced with lime mint.

cakes.name: Lemon Vanilla Basque
cakes.description: Lemon curd meets vanilla Basque—bright and tangy, garnished with lime zest.

cakes.name: Green Grape Guava Hojicha Chiffon Cake
cakes.description: Hojicha chiffon layered with plain cream and guava cream, filled with fresh grapes and guava pulp—light and spring-summer perfect.

cakes.name: Soy Matcha Chiffon
cakes.description: Matcha chiffon with soy custard—no fruit filling but rich bean aroma. Ideal for matcha enthusiasts.

cakes.name: Mocha Japanese Chiffon
cakes.description: Coffee-flavored chiffon with cocoa cream and nut crumbs—fluffy with bittersweet notes.

cakes.name: Fresh Fruit Cream Cake
cakes.description: Signature fruit cream cake using pure animal cream, filled with seasonal fruits like mango and strawberry. Individual portions available.

cakes.name: Hazelnut Cream Cake
cakes.description: Hazelnut cream paired with fluffy sponge—nutty aroma and light texture.

cakes.name: Uji Matcha Red Bean Lava
cakes.description: Uji matcha chiffon with sweet red bean filling, topped with matcha cheese foam—balanced bitterness and sweetness.

cakes.name: Cupcake
cakes.description: Korean-style designs with five flavors (vanilla, chocolate, etc.). Light and moderately sweet.

cakes.name: Mango Pandan Cake
cakes.description: Pandan leaf chiffon with mango pulp—coconut and fruit fusion, moist and fresh.

cakes.name: Spring Cherry Mango
cakes.description: Mango and sakura-flavored mousse—vibrant colors and tangy freshness, embodying spring.

cakes.name: Lemon Almond Tart
cakes.description: Lemon-almond combo with crisp shell and silky filling—bright citrus notes.

cakes.name: Madeleine
cakes.description: Classic shell-shaped butter cake—crispy outside, soft inside. Pairs well with black tea.

cakes.name: Vintage Cream Puff
cakes.description: Nostalgic piped cream puffs with generous filling—moderate sweetness and cute retro look.

cakes.name: Pistachio Snowball
cakes.description: Coconut white chocolate sandwich cookies coated with raspberry powder—crunchy and lightly sweet. Perfect snack or tea companion.

cakes.name: Almond Tuile
cakes.description: Crispy almond slices with caramel—nutty aroma and low sweetness. Ideal coffee pairing.

cakes.name: Earl Grey Diamond Cookie
cakes.description: Earl Grey-infused butter cookies—crisp with lingering tea fragrance.
